DOC.brief_summary: The aim study investigate glycemic control low carbohydrate diet compare high carbohydrate diet adult insulin pump treat type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: Low Carbohydrate Diet vs. High Carbohydrate Diet Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.criteria: Type 1 diabetes ≥3 year Insulin pump use ≥1 year HbA1c ≥53 mmol/mol ( 7.0 % ) BMI 2027 kg/m2 Willingness count carbohydrate use insulin pump bolus calculator boluses intervention period Willingness use continuous glucose monitoring consistently intervention period Females childbearing potential pregnant , breastfeed intend become pregnant use adequate contraceptive method Use SGLT2inhibitors Use corticosteroid within 30 day prior intervention period Celiac disease Inflammatory bowel disease Macroalbuminuria Active proliferative retinopathy combine HbA1c ≥ 75 mmol/mol ( 9.0 % ) Known suspect alcohol drug abuse Other concomitant medical psychological condition accord investigator 's assessment make patient unsuitable study participation
